title: Strengthening Nursing Practice Competencies: High-Speed Rail Spring Steel Design: High Strength and Toughness Implementation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic metallurgy and understanding of materials engineering concepts
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: The principles of chemical composition and heat treatment process design for high-speed rail spring steel can be explained
A steel design proposal meeting target performance (tensile strength ≥2000 MPa, elongation ≥9%) can be derived using a machine learning-based materials design system
The impact of mechanical properties of spring steel on the stability of high-speed rail vehicle bodies can be analyzed
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
